panels.description: Status of ZooKeeper cluster

targets.query: SELECT max("status_code") FROM "zookeeper" WHERE ("project_name" =~ /^$project$/ AND "host" =~ /^$side/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Cluster Status

panels.description: Status of ZooKeeper nodes

targets.query: SELECT min("alive_nodes") FROM "zookeeper" WHERE ("project_name" =~ /^$project$/ AND "host" =~ /^$side/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("total_nodes") - min("alive_nodes") FROM "zookeeper" WHERE ("project_name" =~ /^$project$/ AND "host" =~ /^$side/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Node Status

panels.description: Memory usage by pod

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "memory/usage" WHERE ("namespace_name" =~ /^$project$/ AND "type" = 'pod' AND "pod_name" =~ /$server(.*)/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "pod_name" fill(linear)

SELECT mean("value") FROM "memory/limit" WHERE ("namespace_name" =~ /^$project$/ AND "type" = 'pod' AND "pod_name" =~ /$server(.*)/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "pod_name" fill(linear)

panels.title: Pod Memory Usage

panels.description: CPU usage by pod

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "cpu/usage_rate" WHERE ("namespace_name" =~ /^$project$/ AND "type" = 'pod' AND "pod_name" =~ /$server(.*)/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "pod_name" fill(linear)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "cpu/limit" WHERE ("namespace_name" =~ /^$project$/ AND "type" = 'pod' AND "pod_name" =~ /$server(.*)/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "pod_name" fill(linear)

panels.title: Pod CPU Usage

panels.description: The number of unique z-nodes on a ZooKeeper server has in its data tree

targets.query: SELECT mean("znode_count") FROM "zookeeper" WHERE ("project_name" =~ /^$project$/ AND "server" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "server" fill(null)

panels.title: Number of ZNodes

panels.description: The number of unique ephemeral z-nodes on a ZooKeeper server

targets.query: SELECT mean("ephemerals_count") FROM "zookeeper" WHERE ("project_name" =~ /^$project$/ AND "server" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "server" fill(null)

panels.title: Number of Ephemeral ZNodes

panels.description: The size in bytes of the data tree for a ZooKeeper server

targets.query: SELECT last("approximate_data_size") FROM "zookeeper" WHERE ("project_name" =~ /^$project$/ AND "server" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "server" fill(linear)

panels.title: Size of Data

panels.description: The data usage size in percent for a ZooKeeper server

targets.query: SELECT mean("used_percent") FROM "t_disk" WHERE ("path" =~ /.*$zk_pv_name/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "path" fill(null)

panels.title: Disk usage in percent

panels.description: The data usage size in bytes for a ZooKeeper server

targets.query: SELECT mean("used") FROM "t_disk" WHERE ("path" =~ /.*$zk_pv_name/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "path" fill(null)

panels.title: Disk usage

panels.description: How long on average it takes for this ZooKeeper server to process a request in milliseconds. This is measured since the last restart of the ZooKeeper server

targets.query: SELECT max("average_latency") FROM "zookeeper" WHERE ("project_name" =~ /^$project$/ AND "server" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "server" fill(null)

panels.title: Average Request Latency

panels.description: The minimum time it took this ZooKeeper server to process a request in milliseconds. This is measured since the last restart of this ZooKeeper server

targets.query: SELECT max("min_latency") FROM "zookeeper" WHERE ("project_name" =~ /^$project$/ AND "server" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "server" fill(null)

panels.title: Minimum Request Latency

panels.description: The maximum time it took this ZooKeeper server to process a request in milliseconds. This is measured since the last restart of the ZooKeeper server

targets.query: SELECT max("max_latency") FROM "zookeeper" WHERE ("project_name" =~ /^$project$/ AND "server" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "server" fill(null)

panels.title: Maximum Request Latency

panels.description: The number of active clients connected to a ZooKeeper server

targets.query: SELECT last("num_alive_connections") FROM "zookeeper" WHERE ("project_name" =~ /^$project$/ AND "server" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "server" fill(null)

panels.title: Number of Active Clients

panels.description: How many ZooKeeper packets have been received by a ZooKeeper server

targets.query: SELECT mean("packets_received") FROM "zookeeper" WHERE ("project_name" =~ /^$project$/ AND "server" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "server" fill(null)

panels.title: ZooKeeper Packets Received

panels.description: How many ZooKeeper packets have been sent from a ZooKeeper server

targets.query: SELECT mean("packets_sent") FROM "zookeeper" WHERE ("project_name" =~ /^$project$/ AND "server" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "server" fill(null)

panels.title: ZooKeeper Packets Sent

panels.description:
Shows the current activity status of the backup daemon. The activity status can be one of the following:
* UP - There is at least one successful backup, and the latest backup is successful
* WARNING - There are no successful backups, or the last backup failed
* NOT ACTIVE - The backup is not satisfied
* MISSING - The host of ZooKeeper Backup Daemon is not specified

targets.query: SELECT last("status") FROM "zookeeper_backup_metric" WHERE ("project_name" =~ /^$project$/ AND "host" =~ /^$side/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Backup Daemon Status

valueMaps.text: ZOOKEEPER BACKUP DAEMON IS NOT AVAILABLE

panels.description:
Shows the state of the last backup. The backup status can be one of the following:
 
* SUCCESS - The latest backup is successful
* FAILED - The latest backup failed
* IN QUEUE - The latest backup is in queue
* IN PROGRESS - The latest backup is in progress

targets.query: SELECT last("last_backup_status") FROM "zookeeper_backup_metric" WHERE ("project_name" =~ /^$project$/ AND "host" =~ /^$side/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Last Backup Status

panels.description: Shows the period of time when the last backup process was ended

targets.query: SELECT last("last_backup_time") FROM "zookeeper_backup_metric" WHERE ("project_name" =~ /^$project$/ AND "host" =~ /^$side/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Time of Last Backup

panels.description: Shows the amount of available backups

targets.query: SELECT last("backups_count") FROM "zookeeper_backup_metric" WHERE ("project_name" =~ /^$project$/ AND "host" =~ /^$side/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Backups Count

panels.description: Shows the amount of successful backups

targets.query: SELECT last("successful_backups_count") FROM "zookeeper_backup_metric" WHERE ("project_name" =~ /^$project$/ AND "host" =~ /^$side/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Successful Backups Count

panels.description: Shows the period of time when the last successful backup process was ended

targets.query: SELECT last("last_successful_backup_time") FROM "zookeeper_backup_metric" WHERE ("project_name" =~ /^$project$/ AND "host" =~ /^$side/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Time of Last Successful Backup

panels.description: Shows the backup storage type

targets.query: SELECT last("storage_type") FROM "zookeeper_backup_metric" WHERE ("project_name" =~ /^$project$/ AND "host" =~ /^$side/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Storage Type

panels.description: Shows the size of the last backup

targets.query: SELECT last("last_backup_size") FROM "zookeeper_backup_metric" WHERE ("project_name" =~ /^$project$/ AND "host" =~ /^$side/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Backup Last Version Size

panels.description:
Shows the space occupied by backups and the remaining amount of space. 
Not all storage supports total size, so "Total Volume Space" metrics can be zeroed

targets.query: SELECT (mean("storage_size") - mean("storage_free_space")) FROM "zookeeper_backup_metric" WHERE ("project_name" =~ /^$project$/ AND "host" =~ /^$side/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("storage_size") FROM "zookeeper_backup_metric" WHERE ("project_name" =~ /^$project$/ AND "host" =~ /^$side/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Storage Size/Free Space

panels.description: Shows time spent on last backup

targets.query: SELECT mean("last_backup_spent_time") FROM "zookeeper_backup_metric" WHERE ("project_name" =~ /^$project$/ AND "host" =~ /^$side/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Time Spent on Backup

panels.description:
This widget displays the number of garbage collections grouped by collection type. The statistics take into account two types of garbage collections: Copy - the garbage collector moves objects with links from eden space to survivor space and from survivor space to tenured space, 
MarkSweepCompact - the garbage collector works in tenured space, live objects are moved to the beginning, so garbage remains at the end of memory.

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_difference(max("count")) FROM "jvm_gc_collection_seconds" WHERE ("project_name" =~ /^$project$/ AND "url" =~/$server/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "url",  "name"  fill(null)

panels.title: GC Collection Count

panels.description:
This widget displays the time spent on garbage collections grouped by collection type. 
The statistics take into account two types of garbage collections: Copy - the garbage collector moves objects with links from eden space to survivor space and from survivor space to tenured space, 
MarkSweepCompact - the garbage collector works in tenured space, live objects are moved to the beginning, so garbage remains at the end of memory.

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_difference(max("sum")) FROM "jvm_gc_collection_seconds" WHERE ("project_name" =~ /^$project$/ AND "url" =~/$server/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "url",  "name"  fill(null)

panels.title: GC Collection Time

panels.description: This widget displays the general data on heap memory usage.

targets.query: SELECT mean("gauge") FROM "jvm_memory_bytes_used" WHERE ("area" = 'heap' AND "project_name" =~ /^$project$/ AND "url" =~/$server/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "url" fill(null)
SELECT mean("gauge") FROM "jvm_memory_bytes_max" WHERE ("area" = 'heap' AND "project_name" =~ /^$project$/ AND "url" =~/$server/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "url" fill(null)
SELECT mean("gauge") FROM "jvm_memory_bytes_committed" WHERE ("area" = 'heap' AND "project_name" =~ /^$project$/ AND "url" =~/$server/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "url" fill(null)

panels.title: Heap Memory Usage

panels.description: This widget displays the JVM Memory Pool consumption and limits.

targets.query: SELECT mean("gauge") FROM "jvm_memory_pool_bytes_used" WHERE ("project_name" =~ /^$project$/ AND "url" =~/$server/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "url", "pool" fill(null)
SELECT mean("gauge") FROM "jvm_memory_pool_bytes_max" WHERE ("project_name" =~ /^$project$/ AND "url" =~/$server/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "url", "pool" fill(null)

panels.title: JVM Memory Pool

panels.description: This widget displays the general data on non heap memory usage.

targets.query: SELECT mean("gauge") FROM "jvm_memory_bytes_used" WHERE ("area" = 'nonheap' AND "project_name" =~ /^$project$/ AND "url" =~/$server/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "url" fill(null)

panels.title: Non-Heap Memory Usage

panels.description: This widget displays the data about the thread count.

targets.query: SELECT last("counter") FROM "jvm_threads_started_total" WHERE ("project_name" =~ /^$project$/ AND "url" =~/$server/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "url" fill(null)
SELECT last("gauge") FROM "jvm_threads_daemon" WHERE ("project_name" =~ /^$project$/ AND "url" =~/$server/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "url" fill(null)
SELECT last("gauge") FROM "jvm_threads_peak" WHERE ("project_name" =~ /^$project$/ AND "url" =~/$server/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "url" fill(null)
SELECT last("gauge") FROM "jvm_threads_current" WHERE ("project_name" =~ /^$project$/ AND "jolokia_agent_url" =~/$server/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "jolokia_agent_url" fill(null)

panels.title: Thread Count

list.label: Project
list.name: project
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM zookeeper WITH KEY=project_name

list.label: Server
list.name: server
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM zookeeper WITH KEY=server

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM zookeeper_ext WITH KEY=~/zk_pv_name.*/ WHERE "project_name" =~ /^$project$/
list.label: Volume
list.name: zk_pv_name
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM zookeeper_ext WITH KEY=~/zk_pv_name.*/ WHERE "project_name" =~ /^$project$/
